product_page_short_description: Produces less noise and less heat
full_description:
Antec META V350 350W Power Supply

The Antec META V350 is a 350-watt power supply unit that comes with a 24-pin connector (520mm in length), an 8-pin connector for EPS12V (4+4-pin) (550mm in length), an 8-pin connector for PCI-E (6+2-pin) (550mm in length), two 6-pin connectors for SATA (400mm in length each), and two 6-pin connectors for SATA (400mm in length each). The PSU comes with a Thermal Manager and a 120mm silent fan. It is an advanced low-voltage fan control for optimal heat & noise management and will allow your PSU to stay at an optimal temperature. The 120 mm Silent Fan is ideal for quiet computing and is designed for longer life, guaranteeing hours of operation. It has an AC input voltage of 230VAC, with a frequency range of 47-63Hz and an input current of 5A. The DC output consists of +3.3V, +5V, +12V, -12V, and +5Vsb with maximum current ratings of 18A, 16A, 42A, 0.3A, and 2.5A respectively. The total combined power of the output is 110W, 300W, 3.6W, and 12.5W. The total wattage of the power supply is 350W.

title: Antec ATOM B750 750W 80 Plus Bronze Power Supply
cat_seo_title: Antec Power Supplies Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Discover a wide range of Antec PSU including 350-1300 watt Bronze, Gold, Platinum PSU at best price in BD. Shop online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
Antec ATOM B750 750W 80 Plus Bronze Power Supply

The Antec ATOM B750 is a 750W power supply unit (PSU) designed to provide dependable performance for demanding computer systems. It is compatible with most electrical grids because it runs within the input range of 200-230V~, 6.3A, 50Hz. The power supply outputs are separated into many rails. The +3.3V and +5V rails may each supply up to 18A, while the +12V rail can supply a significant 62.5A. A total of 750W of output power is possible with the 0.3A and 2.5A offered by the +5Vsb and -12V rails, respectively. Because of its great operating efficiency and low energy consumption, this PSU has earned the 80 PLUS BRONZE certification. This certification lowers power expenses. Antec's CircuitShield technology provides industrial-grade protections that guarantee the safety and longevity of the connected components as well as the dependable 750W power supply Antec Atom B750. These protections include Over Voltage Protection (OVP), Under Voltage Protection (UVP), Short Circuit Protection (SCP), and Over Power Protection (OPP). The unit has a 120mm silent fan that maximizes heat dissipation while reducing noise when paired with the Thermal Manager, an intelligent fan control system. Flat cables improve airflow within the case and make cable management easier, which results in a build that is neater and more organized. Better overall performance and stability are achieved by the PSU using the Active Power Factor Correction (APFC), which lowers reactive power and increases efficiency. With these attributes, the Antec Atom B750 is a 750W power supply that is a trusted option for enthusiasts, professionals, and gamers who need a power supply that blends silent operation, efficiency, and safety.

The NeoECO Gold Modular line, with its 100% complete modular design and 80 PLUS Gold certifications, keeps your PC hardware installation simple and clean. The CircuitShield design provides industry-grade protection for your system, keeping it secure in any environment. It boasts a 120mm Silent Fan, improved airflow, and exceptional longevity. full_description:
Antec HCG-750 Gold Series 750W Full Modular Power Supply (10 Years Warranty)

The Antec HCG-750 Gold 750W Full Modular Power Supply is a high-performance Japanese capacitor that guarantees the tightest DC stability and regulation, ensuring dependability for you and your system. It boasts a 120mm FDB FAN, which offers maximum airflow while maintaining the durability and lifespan that is synonymous with Antec excellence. Antec guaranteed 750W of continuous power with this power supply. It is completely modular, which improves ventilation and decreases clutter. It is 80 PLUS GOLD certified and may save you up to 92% on your power cost. A server-class full-bridge LLC architecture with a synchronous rectification based on a DC-DC topology is used in this. The Antec HCG-750 Gold 750W Full Modular Power Supply has superior low-voltage fan management, including a fan-off mode at low loads for complete silence. It has an output voltage of 99%+12V for optimal CPU and GPU compatibility. It also features CircuitShield, a comprehensive suite of industrial grade protections: OCP, OVP, UVP, SCP, OPP, OTP, SIP, NLO, and 100% Japanese capacitors produce unparalleled tight voltage control as well as minimal ripple and noise to enhance system performance. The 28(18+10) pin MBU socket is intended for future MBU connections. The Antec HCG-750 Gold 750W Full Modular Power Supply is ATX12V 2.4, designed to meet the most recent PSU guidelines, and compatible with the most recent CPU generation. Its 140mm depth power supply is ideal for smaller ATX chassis due to its small size. The Antec HCG-750 Gold 750W Full Modular Power Supply comes with a 10-year warranty.

If loads of power, high-level engineering and extreme efficiency are what youâ€™re after, the HCG Gold series is the ideal power supply in any situation.

80 PLUS Gold Certified

Delivering up to 92% efficiency, the High Current Gamer Gold series utilizes active PFC, 100% Japanese capacitors, and provides efficiency during max and low loadsâ€”living up to the performance standards that we are known for.

135 mm FDB FAN

Antec HCG 1000 gold Fully Modular Power Supply is very quiet PSU. It is dubbed as the whisper-quiet, 135mm fluid-dynamic bearing (FDB) fan provides high airflow with the durability and longevity that is a signature of Antec quality.

100% Japanese capacitors

Using 100% high-performance Japanese capacitors, the HCG Gold series ensures the tightest DC stability and regulation, for reliability that you and your system can count on.

Server-grade 50Â°C Temperature Rating

HCG 1000 Gold delivers non-stop industrial class performance for high-end computer systems at up to 50Â°C ambient.

PhaseWave Design

Fully modular cable management system

Industry-leading

PowerCache

product_list_short_description: Produces less noise and less heat
cat_seo_title: Antec Power Supplies Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Discover a wide range of Antec PSU including 350-1300 watt Bronze, Gold, Platinum PSU at best price in BD. Shop online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
product_page_short_description: Produces less noise and less heat
full_description:
Antec META V450 450W Power Supply

The Antec META V450 is a 450-watt power supply unit that comes with a 24-pin connector (520mm in length), an 8-pin connector for EPS12V (4+4-pin) (550mm in length), an 8-pin connector for PCI-E (6+2-pin) (550mm in length), two 6-pin connectors for SATA (400mm in length each), and two 6-pin connectors for SATA (400mm in length each). The PSU comes with a Thermal Manager and a 120mm silent fan. It is an advanced low-voltage fan control for optimal heat & noise management and will allow your PSU to stay at an optimal temperature. The 120 mm Silent Fan is ideal for quiet computing and is designed for longer life, guaranteeing hours of operation. It has an AC input voltage of 230VAC, with a frequency range of 47-63Hz and an input current of 5A. The DC output consists of +3.3V, +5V, +12V, -12V, and +5Vsb with maximum current ratings of 18A, 16A, 42A, 0.3A, and 2.5A respectively. The total combined power of the output is 110W, 300W, 3.6W, and 12.5W. The total wattage of the power supply is 450W.
